name: TalkOClock, Inc.
overview:
TalkOâ€™clock is a social alarm service. Instead of annoying tunes, you will be woken up at the right time by a friendly stranger. Now it is fun to get woken up and wake somebody up!

You can either set an alarm clock for yourself and then at the right time you will receive a call on your cell phone and a wish of good morning from a stranger, or you can be that stranger and call somebody to wake him/her up. You wonâ€™t miss urgent matters and will get energized with positive emotions for the whole day by conversation with a friendly stranger.

You can use TalkOâ€™clock service either by downloading application for iPhone or Android, or on the website. You can sign up for TalkOâ€™clock via Facebook. But you can be sure users don’t know phone numbers of each other because all phone connections are secure and anonymous.

Our purpose is to solve old problems with new means. There is no doubt that there are various alarm clocks and wakeup services, including smartphone apps, already available for a long time. However, there has never been such a product like we offer until now! You can never guess who is going to call you and what he/she is going to tell you. At the same time, everybody can try the role of â€œwaking personâ€, and get an energizing charge of positive emotions from waking up a person from the other part of the country. Moreover, the service allows choosing the gender of the person who will call you.

Donâ€™t you think that a sweet female voice on the phone in 6 AM is much more energizing than a cup of Espresso? We are striving to create a community of positive people who are ready to share their emotions and make themselves and surrounding people happy, thatâ€™s why you should not be surprised hearing a poem or brass band in your iPhone!

video_embeds.description: How a random call can change life?
